__inputs.name: DS_THEMIS
__inputs.label: prometheus
__inputs.description: A prometheus server with prometheus server metrics

description:
Get started faster with Grafana Cloud then easily build these dashboards. https://grafana.com/products/cloud/
Overview of metrics from Prometheus 2.0.  
Useful for using prometheus to monitor your prometheus.
Revisions welcome!

panels.description: Percentage of uptime during the most recent $interval period.  Change the period with the 'interval' dropdown above.
panels.title: Uptime [$interval]

panels.description:
Servers which are DOWN RIGHT NOW! 
FIX THEM!!
panels.title: Currently Down

panels.description: Total number of time series in prometheus
panels.title: Total Series

panels.description: The total number of rule group evaluations missed due to slow rule group evaluation.
panels.title: Missed Iterations [$interval]

panels.description: The total number of rule group evaluations skipped due to throttled metric storage.
panels.title: Skipped Iterations [$interval]

panels.description: Total number of scrapes that hit the sample limit and were rejected.
panels.title: Tardy Scrapes [$interval]

panels.description: Number of times the database failed to reload block data from disk.
panels.title: Reload Failures [$interval]

panels.description: Rate of total number of appended samples
panels.title: Appended Samples per Second

panels.description: Total number of syncs that were executed on a scrape pool.
panels.title: Scrape Sync Total

panels.description: Actual interval to sync the scrape pool.
panels.title: Target Sync

panels.description: The duration of rule group evaluations
panels.title: Average Rule Evaluation Duration

panels.description:
Rule-group evaluations 
 - total
 - missed due to slow rule group evaluation
 - skipped due to throttled metric storage
panels.title: Rule Evaluator Iterations

panels.description: This is probably wrong!  Please help.
panels.title: Go Memory Usage (FIXME)

title: Prometheus 2.0 Overview
